scenariodescription: The robot is tasked with transporting a box from one rack to the packaging area. Along the way, it has to navigate through a Passageway intersection. At the intersection, the robot encounters a group of 3 warehouse employees standing together and discussing something. The robot needs to pass through this intersection to complete its task.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 is part of the group standing at the intersection. When the robot approaches and says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 1 looks in the direction of the robot and then gives way to the robot. If the robot doesn’t say 'EXCUSE ME', Human 1 continues standing in the group.
humanbehavior.Human 2: Human 2 is part of the group standing at the intersection. When the robot approaches and says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 2 follows Human 1's action and also gives way to the robot. If the robot doesn’t say 'EXCUSE ME', Human 2 continues standing in the group.
humanbehavior.Human 3: Human 3 is part of the group standing at the intersection. When the robot approaches and says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 3 follows Human 1's and Human 2's actions and gives way to the robot. If the robot doesn’t say 'EXCUSE ME', Human 3 continues standing in the group.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot should detect the group of humans blocking the intersection and say 'EXCUSE ME' to get their attention and clear the path. Upon hearing 'EXCUSE ME', the group should give way, allowing the robot to pass through the intersection.
